Reduced body image concerns: People would no longer worry about societal standards of beauty, as they would have the power to shape their appearance according to their personal preferences.
Greater diversity in human appearance: People would be more diverse in their physical characteristics, leading to a more inclusive and accepting society.

Increased pressure to maintain appearance: People would have the power to create the perfect body, but this could lead to increased pressure to maintain their appearance and could potentially lead to body image disorders.
